sense.def:
To have a grudge against someone
pomeni gojiti neprijateljska čustva do nekoga, ker nam je v preteklosti storil kaj hudega.

seg.quote: They had to do it, and I bear them no grudge.
It isn't in her nature to hold grudges.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ,
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
To grudge someone something
pomeni nekomu nerad nekaj dati ali ne biti vesel, da nekdo nekaj ima.

seg.quote: We need not grudge them their mindless pleasures.
Not that I grudge the use of my kitchen to you.
